title: Substitution with Integers
instructions: Do the substitution on a piece of paper.

questions.question: Evaluate xy + x if x = 7 and y = -5.
Evaluate x - z - y if x = -6,  y = 7, z = -4.
Evaluate u(v - u) if u = 6 and v = -4.
Evaluate x - (y + 6) if x = -8 and y = -10.
Evaluate 10x + y if x = -3 and y = 4.
Evaluate x - 9y if x = 2 and y = -9.
Evaluate x - x - y  if x = -2 and y = -8.
Evaluate x - (y - y) if x = -3 and y = 7.
Evaluate x + y + y if x = -7 and y = -10.
